title: Tzatziki Sauce
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
method: Step 1: Peel cucumbers; remove seeds with a spoon. Grate cucumber on the large holes of a box grater, then squeeze to drain excess liquid.
Step 2: In a food processor combine the grated cucumber with Greek yogurt, garlic, olive oil, dill, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Blend until smooth.
Step 3: Serve immediately or for best flavor cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving.
